projects.name: Albumdle
projects.description: A website similar to Wordle, but instead of words its the top albums of all time.
projects.tools: TypeScript, Postgres, React, Remix, Chakra ui, and the Spotify API.

projects.name: Webscraping Website
projects.description: A website that takes the weekly prices of Target's and Urban Outfitters products and displays them in a list.
projects.tools: TypeScript, React, MongoDB, Remix, Chakra ui, and cron jobs

projects.name: Spotify Stats Game
projects.description: A website that takes your top 100 songs and creates a game of guessing which song is deemed more popular.
projects.tools: JavaScript, React, Node.js, Chakra ui, and the Spotify API.

projects.name: Music Weather Website
projects.description: A website that takes will make you a playlist based on the weather in your area.
projects.tools: JavaScript, Node.js, and the Spotify API.
